name: Sofa Breat
description: The Sofa Breat is a perfect blend of comfort and style. With its plush cushions and modern design, it offers an inviting space to relax and unwind. This sofa is currently available at a discounted price

name: Sofa Laguno
description: Experience ultimate comfort with the Sofa Laguno. Its stylish design and high-quality materials make it a great addition to any living space. Enjoy the comfort of this sofa at a special discounted price.

name: Sofa Montasi
description: The Sofa Montasi combines luxury and functionality. Its elegant design and superior comfort make it a must-have for any home. Take advantage of the discounted price and bring home this exquisite piece

name: Sofa Rochelle
description: Discover the elegance of the Sofa Rochelle. Designed for both comfort and style, this sofa is perfect for any living room. It is available now at a discounted price, making it an excellent value

name: Sofa Walter
description: The Sofa Walter offers unparalleled comfort and style. Its contemporary design and plush seating make it a standout piece for any home. Available at a discounted price, it is a great deal for those seeking quality and comfort.

name: Luis Sectoional Sofa
description: This sectional sofa offers ample seating space, making it perfect for both entertaining guests and relaxing with family. The contemporary design seamlessly integrates into any decor, while the high-quality materials ensure durability and comfort for years to come.

name: Serra Wooden Sofa-Set
description: The Serra Wooden Sofa-Set combines timeless elegance with robust construction. Featuring beautifully crafted wooden frames and comfortable cushions, this sofa-set adds a touch of sophistication to any living room. Its classic design ensures it complements various decor styles, providing both comfort and style.

name: Alden Wooden Sofa -Finish- Mahogany (Moss Green Velvet)
description: The Alden Wooden Sofa, finished in rich mahogany and upholstered in luxurious moss green velvet, exudes elegance and comfort. Its classic wooden frame paired with plush cushions makes it a standout piece in any living room..

name: Florence Wooden Sofa - Finish Mahogany (Monochrome Paisley)
description: The Florence Wooden Sofa is a beautifully crafted piece of furniture that brings a touch of elegance to any living space. Made from high-quality solid wood with a rich mahogany finish, this sofa features a sophisticated monochrome paisley design that adds a classic yet modern appeal.

name: Janet 2 Seater Fabric Loveseat In Adrian Velvet Colour
description: The Janet 2 Seater Fabric Loveseat in Adrian Velvet Colour offers a perfect blend of luxury and comfort. Designed for both style and durability, the loveseat has a sturdy wooden frame and plush cushions that provide exceptional support and comfort.
